name: DareNotSpeakItsName_ARTIFACT_07
description: Abomination. This NFT is an artifact from my 1995 interactive animated dynamic collage, DareNotSpeakItsName. The jpg is a screen capture of the state of the animated collage at a moment of user engagement with the artwork. Composed from my photographs and video, as well as appropriated images, texts, sound, and dialogue from "The Wizard of Oz", gay porn videos, and news articles, DareNotSpeakItsName explored the relationship between mass-media representation, identity, imagination, and viewership as mechanisms of the closet.
